title: Pin “More details” button to bottom of guide container on Pre‑Meditation page

requirements.summary: Adjust the Pre‑Meditation guide container layout so the “More details” button (id '1dl1fqs') stays pinned to the bottom of its parent container (id '1j6s3jt') regardless of guide content height, without changing the button’s navigation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Pre‑Meditation page, within the guide parent container '1j6s3jt', the '1dl1fqs' “More details” button renders at the bottom edge of that container (visually below the guide content).
When the guide content height changes (short vs. long text), the '1dl1fqs' button remains at the bottom of the container and does not float mid-container.
The button continues to perform its existing navigation behavior (redirect to Knowledge page) without introducing regressions.

file_operations.description: Within the selected layout scope for the Pre‑Meditation setup UI (the container corresponding to /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]), update the guide parent container with id '1j6s3jt' to use a column flex layout and reserve remaining vertical space for the guide content (e.g., make guide content area flex-grow) so the “More details” button with id '1dl1fqs' can be placed after the guide content and pinned to the bottom (e.g., via mt-auto / flex alignment). Keep the existing click handler/navigation logic unchanged and avoid modifying unrelated elements listed in non-goals.
